title: This lifetime of CompTIA exam training can get you into IT for under $40
content:
Macworld

With so many tech platforms and disciplines out there, it’s tough for any enterprising IT worker to know which areas to concentrate their learning. Do you train up on cloud-based services like Microsoft and Google or dig in on networking with Cisco coursework?

Thankfully, the expansive schooling available as part of The Complete CompTIA and IT Exam Lifetime Access Training Bundle means tech learners will have access to virtually every major area of IT training whenever they need it most.

Packed with over 180 hours of instruction, this bundle of five courses covers several of the biggest IT and CompTIA essential fields of study for any knowledgeable IT pro.

Known for their top-notch online training, these Exams Digest courses tackle all the biggest training fields in the industry today, including CompTIA, AWS, Cisco, Microsoft, and more.

Along with courses digging deep into major topics like CramWise, LinuxPath, DojoLab, and CodeDirect, the bundle features a lifetime of ExamsDigest access, which includes a full complement of e-learning tools like exam simulators, IT labs, and beyond.

From understanding everything from cybersecurity and AWS databases to building a complete Linux environment from the ground up, this wide-ranging package can put virtually any learner on the path to full IT certification in all their chosen disciplines.

Regularly nearly $2,800, all the coursework in the huge Complete CompTIA and IT Exam Lifetime Access Training Bundle is slashed to only $39.99 when you use the 20% off coupon code SECURE20 during checkout. Just complete the purchase by 11:59 p.m. PT on Apr. 7 to lock in your deal.
